Section2-Desc: Big Data Solution or use case that can review, assess, map and analyze existing products and the effectiveness of client campaigns, so that clients can set optimal campaign strategies with the aim of optimizing service growth.
Section2-Benefit1: Doing develop tools that can show detailed profiling of clients' customers.
Section2-Benefit3: Obtaining holistic data to better understand customers.
Section2-Benefit4: Have a complete and easy to understand customer data source.
Section2-Objective1: Presenting holistic data to understand customers.
